comments:
3.3 RC1

Exception written to .log when appling a patch of which only some code is in the workspace, e.g. a patch that has a fix for real code and also updated test cases but I only have the real code in my workspace.

Concrete Test Case:
1. load org.eclipse.jdt.core from HEAD
2. apply https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=68541
==> error is written to .log as soon as I come to the preview page.

Dani, were you still able to apply the patch? Was there any other side effects other then the error being written to the log? I'm trying to determine why you think this is a major problem.
Everything worked fine when using the UI but when I then see an "Internal Error" in the .log I get scared i.e. was it OK what I saw in the preview?

Created an attachment (id=68594)
Patch to fix the logged error

It turns out the fix is trivial. Dani, can I get you to review the patch?
Code is good and patch fixes the bug.
